keyMoments.moment: Red Hair Pirates meet with Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.significance: Rare meeting between two Yonko crews that the World Government tried to prevent

keyMoments.moment: Shanks boards Moby Dick alone to speak with Whitebeard
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shanks' confidence and the trust between the captains

description: One of the Four Emperors' crews, led by Shanks. Known for their incredible strength despite having a relatively small crew size.

keyMoments.moment: Multiple crew members faint from Shanks' Conqueror's Haki
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power difference between regular pirates and Yonko-level fighters

keyMoments.moment: Whitebeard refuses to stop Ace from pursuing Blackbeard
keyMoments.significance: Decision that will lead to the crew's involvement in the Marineford War

description: One of the Four Emperors' crews, led by Whitebeard. The crew operates as a family, with Whitebeard viewing his subordinates as his sons.

keyMoments.moment: Learn their bounties will all increase due to Enies Lobby
keyMoments.significance: Recognition of their growing threat level to the World Government

keyMoments.moment: Construction of their new ship begins
keyMoments.significance: The beginning of the Thousand Sunny, their future home

description: The pirate crew led by Monkey D. Luffy, currently resting in Water 7 after the events at Enies Lobby.
